MOSDAC provides satellite-based meteorological and oceanographic data services to users across India. It includes real-time satellite imagery, rainfall estimates, sea surface temperature, and cyclone tracking information.

The platform aggregates data from INSAT-3D, INSAT-3DR, SCATSAT-1, and other Indian satellites. These products support disaster management, weather forecasting, agriculture, and marine applications.

Users can access data through interactive maps and download raw satellite data and processed products.
